sentences.sContent: He ran across the courtyard, dodging a storm of bullets.
sentences.sCn: 他跑过院子，躲避雨点般的子弹。

remMethod.val: 此地不宜久留(lodge)， 回避(dodge)为妙

words.tran: 狡猾的，逃避的；善于骗人的；躲闪的

trans.tranOther: to move quickly to avoid someone or something
to deliberately avoid discussing something or doing something

trans.tranCn: 托辞， 伎俩； 躲闪， 躲避
trans.tranOther: something dishonest that is done to avoid a rule or law
